properties.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 4 at 8:14PM PST until January 6 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph
expected.

* WHERE...Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los
Angeles.

* WHEN...From noon Sunday to 3 PM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and
make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may
result.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will be between
Malibu and the 405 Freeway.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM NOON SUNDAY TO 3 PM PST MONDAY
